metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare Application Services | Security and Performance
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare provides application services that help you deliver rich user experiences for Internet applications — all while prioritizing security without compromising on performance.

promotionalBanner.desktopText: Cloudflare was recently named a Leader in the Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Web Application and API Protection (WAAP)

relatedBlades.title: Secure and Deliver Applications
relatedBlades.subtitle: Making websites, apps and APIs secure, fast and productive
relatedBlades.copy:
- Easily protect applications and APIs from abuse, stop bad bots, thwart DDoS attacks, and monitor for suspicious activity.
- Increase web and application performance by bringing content closer to your users.
relatedBlades.leftLink: [Ready to talk to an expert? Click here to get in touch.](https://www.cloudflare.com/plans/enterprise/contact/)

features.title: A single network and console for full integration
features.description: Cloudflare gives you a single, powerful application security posture. Our products are managed from a streamlined, single console for security integration, all running on a single rules engine for no gaps in protections.

features.title: Precise, data-driven security
features.description: Cloudflare protects millions of web properties and serves tens of millions of HTTP requests per second on average. This reach provides unmatched visibility into threats, enables our machine learning models to keep getting better with time and ensures we never sidetrack business with false positives.

features.title: Global Scale
features.description: Cloudflare's global Anycast network spans %{DataCenterCount} cities across %{CountryCount} countries, reducing latency and time to first byte by delivering content closer to visitors.

relatedBlades.title: Never compromise security for performance
relatedBlades.copy:
- Built natively from the ground up with a consistent architecture. Every security service runs from every data center.
- Content is always a blink away for incredible experiences on any device, regardless of traffic spikes, attacks, and outages.
- Better, more precise security through faster security protections and data-driven insights from our global cloud network.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare for Enterprises Large and Small Illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare for Enterprises Large and Small Illustration

relatedBlades.title: Gartner® named Cloudflare a "Leader" in Web Application and API Protection
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader in the 2022 "Gartner Magic Quadrant for WAAP" report. We believe this recognition validates that we protect against emerging threats faster, offer tighter integration of security capabilities, and deliver powerful ease of use and deployment.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare is a Leader in the Gartner Magic Quadrant™ for WAAP
imageAssetFile.title: Gartner WAAP Magic Quadrant

relatedBlades.title: IDC named Cloudflare a "Leader" in CDN services
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader in the 2022 IDC MarketScape for Worldwide Commercial Content Delivery Network Services. In particular, IDC described Cloudflare as "a highly innovative vendor, continuing to invest in advanced technologies such as virtualization, serverless, AI/ML, IoT, HTTP3, 5G and (mobile) edge computing."

relatedBlades.title: Top use cases
relatedBlades.copy:
- __Easily securing APIs__ - Get the right security & management in place to power an API centric business.
- __Stop losing users to poor experiences__ - Slow loading websites cost retailers an estimated $2B per year.
- __Accelerate mobile experiences__ -  Quickly detect mobile devices and optimize content for richer experiences.

Gain a modern application security posture by making Cloudflare's network your enterprise security perimeter. All Cloudflare application security, managed from a single console, is delivered from our global edge network of %{DataCenterCount} data centers in more than %{CountryCount} countries for incredible performance, reliability and unlimited scalability.
relatedBlades.title: Powerful application security from the Cloudflare edge
relatedBlades.subtitle: Website and application security services

features.description: Protect your business-critical web applications from attacks.

features.description: Make our massive global network your secure API gateway.

features.description: Manage good / bad bots — stop bad bots with threat intelligence at scale.

features.description: Protect against Magecart and JavaScript supply chain attacks.

features.description: Protect against abusive behavior — DDoS, brute force login, etc.

features.description: Secure visitor data and boost SEO rankings.

features.description: Secure customer data with strong data encryption.

features.description: Attack surface management and mitigate threats in a few clicks.

features.description: Granular lens into network traffic.

features.description: Threat intelligence and operations that bolsters security postures and SOC effectiveness.

features.title: Images
features.description: Build a highly scalable image pipeline to resize, optimize, store, and deliver images.

features.title: Stream
features.description: Ingest, encode, record, and play live or on-demand videos.

relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare makes your sites and applications perform like never before.  With our global Anycast network, content is always a blink away for incredible experiences on any device. We keep you online and available, regardless of traffic spikes, attacks, and outages.
relatedBlades.title: Supercharge your applications
relatedBlades.subtitle: Website and application performance services
